00155 bool cVector3int::copyTo( cVector3int* destination 
00156                                               ) const
00157 {
00158         // input checks
00159         if( NULL == destination ) {
00160                 return false;
00161         }
00162 
00163         destination->x = x;
00164         destination->y = y;
00165         destination->z = z;
00166 
00167         return true;
00168 }

00185 
00188 cMovement::cMovement( const cMovement& original )
00189 {
00190         m_size = original.m_size;
00191         if( m_size > 0 )
00192         {
00193                 m_buffer = new cVector3int[ m_size ];
00194                 memcpy( m_buffer, original.m_buffer, m_size*sizeof(cVector3int) );
00195         }
00196         else
00197         {
00198                 m_buffer = NULL;
00199         }
00200 }

00215 bool cMovement::copy( const cMovement& original )
00216 {       
00217         m_size = original.m_size;
00218         if( m_size > 0 )
00219         {
00220                 if( NULL != m_buffer ) {
00221                         delete [] m_buffer;
00222                 }
00223 
00224                 m_buffer = new cVector3int[ m_size ];
00225                 memcpy( m_buffer, original.m_buffer, m_size*sizeof(cVector3int) );
00226         }
00227         else
00228         {
00229                 m_buffer = NULL;
00230         }
00231         return true;
00232 }

00238 void cMovement::clear()
00239 {
00240         if( NULL != m_buffer ) {
00241                 delete [] m_buffer;
00242         }
00243         m_buffer = NULL;
00244         m_size = 0;
00245 }

00253 bool cMovement::initialise( const std::vector<cVector3int>& inMove )
00254 {
00255         if( NULL != m_buffer ) {
00256                 delete [] m_buffer;
00257         }
00258 
00259         if( inMove.empty() ){
00260                 return false;
00261         }
00262 
00263         // create buffer
00264         m_size = (unsigned int)inMove.size();
00265         m_buffer = new cVector3int[ m_size ];
00266         cVector3int* iterBuffer = m_buffer;
00267 
00268         // copy data
00269         std::vector<cVector3int>::const_iterator iter;
00270         for( iter = inMove.begin(); iter != inMove.end(); iter++ )
00271         {
00272                 iter->copyTo( iterBuffer );
00273                 iterBuffer++;
00274         }
00275 
00276         return true;
00277 }

00284 bool cMovement::initialise( const unsigned int size,                    
00285                                                         const cVector3int* vectorArray )        
00286 {
00287         // input checks
00288         if( 0 == size ) {
00289                 return false; 
00290         }
00291 
00292         if( NULL != m_buffer ) {
00293                 delete [] m_buffer;
00294         }
00295 
00296         // create buffer
00297         m_size = size;
00298         m_buffer = new cVector3int[ m_size ];
00299         if( vectorArray ) {
00300                 memcpy( m_buffer, vectorArray, m_size*sizeof(cVector3int) );
00301         }
00302 
00303         return true;
00304 }

00307 
00313 bool cMovement::changeVectorSize( const cMovement& inputMovement,       
00314                                                                   const unsigned int newSize,           
00315                                                                   cMovement* ptOutputMovement )         
00316 {
00317         // input checks
00318         if( NULL == ptOutputMovement ||
00319                 &inputMovement == ptOutputMovement) 
00320         {
00321                 return false;
00322         }
00323 
00324         if( ptOutputMovement->getSize() != newSize )
00325         {
00326                 // output buffer creation
00327                 if( NULL != ptOutputMovement->m_buffer ) {
00328                         delete [] ptOutputMovement->m_buffer;
00329                 }
00330                 ptOutputMovement->m_size = newSize;
00331                 ptOutputMovement->m_buffer = new cVector3int[ newSize ];
00332         }
00333 
00334 
00335         // Compute normalised vector
00336         for( unsigned int i=0; i<newSize; i++ )
00337         {
00338                 // Start                  End
00339                 // S-------X-------X------E             Movement
00340                 //       A         B
00341                 // S----------X-----------E             Normalised
00342                 //         C = value to find
00343                 // A B, closed value to C
00344                 //
00345                 // X = value(A)*(distanceBC/distanceAB) + value(B)*(distanceAC/distanceAB)
00346                 // distanceAB = 1/ (movement vector size -1)
00347                 // distanceSA = distanceAB* A index (same for SB)
00348                 // distanceSC = ( 1/ (normalised vector size -1) ) * C index
00349                 // distanceAC = distanceSC - distanceSA
00350                 // distanceBC = distanceSB - distanceSC
00351 
00352                 int indexC = i;
00353                 float distanceAB = ( 1.0f/((float)inputMovement.getSize()-1.0f) );
00354                 float distanceSC = ( 1.0f/((float)ptOutputMovement->getSize()-1.0f) ) * indexC;
00355                 
00356                 int indexA=0, indexB=0;
00357                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<inputMovement.getSize(); j++)
00358                 {
00359                         if(  j*distanceAB == distanceSC )
00360                         {
00361                                 indexA = j; 
00362                                 indexB = j;
00363                                 break;
00364                         }
00365                         if( j*distanceAB > distanceSC )
00366                         {
00367                                 indexA = j-1; 
00368                                 indexB = j;
00369                                 break;
00370                         }
00371                 }
00372 
00373                 float distanceSA = distanceAB * indexA;
00374                 float distanceSB = distanceAB * indexB;
00375                 float distanceAC = distanceSC - distanceSA;
00376                 float distanceBC = distanceSB - distanceSC;
00377 
00378                 if( indexA == indexB )
00379                 {
00380                         ptOutputMovement->m_buffer[i] = inputMovement.m_buffer[indexA];
00381                 }
00382                 else
00383                 {
00384                         // 0.5f added to have a better float to int cast
00385                         // NOTE : this works ONLY when the float value is greater than 0
00386                         // In the case of the accelerometers values as used in AGR, this is not an issue. 
00387                         ptOutputMovement->m_buffer[i].x = (int)( 0.5f + inputMovement.m_buffer[indexA].x*(distanceBC/distanceAB) + 
00388                                                                                   inputMovement.m_buffer[indexB].x*(distanceAC/distanceAB) );
00389                         ptOutputMovement->m_buffer[i].y = (int)( 0.5f + inputMovement.m_buffer[indexA].y*(distanceBC/distanceAB) + 
00390                                                                                   inputMovement.m_buffer[indexB].y*(distanceAC/distanceAB) );
00391                         ptOutputMovement->m_buffer[i].z = (int)( 0.5f + inputMovement.m_buffer[indexA].z*(distanceBC/distanceAB) + 
00392                                                                                   inputMovement.m_buffer[indexB].z*(distanceAC/distanceAB) );
00393                 }
00394         }
00395 
00396         return true;
00397 }
